body_html:
However, what happened is that I downloaded all the python source code from the tensorflow git project without any modification. The tokenizer is also the original basic_tokenizer in data_utils.py.

I ran the command below as instructed on https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.11/tutorials/seq2seq/index.html.
I believe I exactly followed all the instructions in the tutorial, but I still cannot reproduce the results. Did I miss anything?

python translate.py
  --data_dir [your_data_directory] --train_dir [checkpoints_directory]
  --en_vocab_size=40000 --fr_vocab_size=40000

body:
However, what happened is that I downloaded all the python source code from the tensorflow git project without any modification. The tokenizer is also the original basic_tokenizer in data_utils.py. 

I ran the command below as instructed on https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.11/tutorials/seq2seq/index.html. 
I believe I exactly followed all the instructions in the tutorial, but I still cannot reproduce the results. Did I miss anything? 

```
python translate.py
  --data_dir [your_data_directory] --train_dir [checkpoints_directory]
  --en_vocab_size=40000 --fr_vocab_size=40000
```
